text:
These are definitely updated 🇮🇹 #COVID19italia 🇮🇹 guidelines for Lombardy region:

➡️ Moderate+ (>70 and/or condition, or pneumonia sx) 
💊 #chloroquine + kaletra 💊 + /alternate/

➡️ Severe 💊 #remdesivir + chloroquine 💊 + /alternate/

Also #Actemra playing a role in there 🤔 https://t.co/n6peWsY8uQ
